stimulusHtml:
The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Purchase, Lila Acheson Wallace, Drs. Daniel and Marian Malcolm, Laura G. and James J. Ross, Jeffrey B. Soref, The Robert T. Wall Family, Dr. and Mrs. Sidney G. Clyman, and Steven Kossak Gifts, 2008

The work shown can be identified as
choicesHtml: an ndop portrait figure created by the Kuba peoples
an Ikenga shrine figure created by the Igbo peoples
a byeri reliquary figure created by the Fang peoples
an Nkisi n’kondi power figure created by the Kongo peoples
